schedulerActions.commands: echo It's first day of the month, so it's time for data dump! ; mkdir -p $HOME/Mongo-dumps ; export work_date=$(date +'%Y-%m-%d--%H%M') && mongodump --host SERVICE_DOMAIN --port SERVICE_PORT --out $HOME/Mongo-dumps/${work_date} && cd $HOME/Mongo-dumps/ && tar cf ${work_date}.tar.gz ${work_date}/ && rm -rf ${work_date}

configure.commands:
printf "
bind_ip = SERVICE_ADDRESS
port = SERVICE_PORT
dbpath = SERVICE_PREFIX/database
logappend = true
logpath = SERVICE_LOG
pidfilepath = SERVICE_PID
unixSocketPrefix = SERVICE_PREFIX
fork = true
slave = true
source = # TYPE YOUR SOURCE SERVER HERE
" > SERVICE_CONF

validate.commands: test ! -f SERVICE_PREFIX/database && mkdir -p SERVICE_PREFIX/database && chmod 700 SERVICE_PREFIX/database
